summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fuhrman Avenue from Allison Street to Eastlake Avenue et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 17543, creating Local Improvement District No. 1661 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
